jobDescription: Business Analyst / Data Analyst 4-6 months  Chicago, IL 60601 (locals preferred for F2F interview) Overview: Our client requires a Business / Data Analyst to join their Project Support Team in Chicago.  The BA/DA must be able to work between several projects with ease and will provide insights and metrics on how to create and maintain an enterprise a data warehouse solution.  They will elicit requirements, build business user stories, translate the needs of the business, and provide the client a “how-to” get that information into an executable plan. Qualifications / Required Skills:Must have 2-3+ years of Tableau report development experience creating worksheets, data visualizations including reports and dashboards including: Develop Tableau based ad hoc user Interface for end users.Perform detailed data analysis, determine the structure, content, and quality of the dataDefine, execute and interpret complex / nested SQL queriesSupport the Business Intelligence/Analytics with the understanding of business and data requirements, and iteratively designs visualizations including: Build prototypes for demonstration and illustration purposes for Business usersManage a repository of re-usable data visualization templates and viewsDocument, evolve, and communicate artifacts developed using TableauCollaborate with other developers around data/table structures and optimize them for TableauDashboards and other self-service requirementsDocument technical specifications, optimized techniques, queries, and final deliverablesApply SDLC methodologies to develop, test, deploy, and manage Tableau workbooks and follow naming conventions and coding standards and document the workbooksTableau Desktop and Server Certified Professional Huge plusExperience with database design, query performance tuning and optimization, database development and data manipulation using PL/SQL and T-SQL.Strong understanding of relational and dimensional database and data warehousingAbility to manage multiple priorities and meet critical deadlinesDemonstrated partnership with business clients and value proposition of projects/portfolioStrong analytical and problem-solving skillsStrong customer service skillsExperience working with dedicated and matrixed resourcesAbility to establish / build cross divisional relationships / collaboration
